title: Change in Africa due to Atlantic slave trade

content.question: Which of the following represents a significant change in Africa between 1450 C.E. and 1750 C.E.?

choices.label: Bantu-speaking people spread iron metallurgy to East and Central Africa.
Europeans established settler colonies in East and Central Africa.
Most enslaved Africans were transported across the Atlantic instead of the Sahara.
Islam was introduced and widely adopted in North Africa.

content.answer: Most enslaved Africans were transported across the Atlantic instead of the Sahara.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
